import React from 'react'; import { useAsync } from 'react-async'; const johnnyBio = "https://api.themoviedb.org/3/person/85?api_key=" + process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY + "&language=en-US" // Then we'll fetch user data from this API const getJohnnysBioTask = async () => await fetch(johnnyBio) .then(res => (res.ok ? res : Promise.reject(res))) .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => res.biography) const Bio = (props) => { const { data, error, isLoading } = useAsync({ promiseFn: getJohnnysBioTask }) if (isLoading) return "Loading..." if (error) return `Something went wrong: ${error.message} Johnnys Bio` if (data) { console.log(data) return data } return(
Character Overview

Raul Duke

Raoul Duke is the fictional character and antihero based on Hunter S. Thompson in his autobiographical novel Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas. The book was originally written under the name Raoul Duke.

{/*
*/}
) } export default Bio
